features: THE PERFECT BABY REGISTRY, BABY SHOWER & NEWBORN GIFT SET: The nanobebe Starter Set is a baby care and breastfeeding mom essential. This set includes a variety of innovative baby items including the award winning nanobebe breast milk baby bottles, a warming bowl, and the flexy pacifiers to calm and soothe your little one.

ALL-IN-ONE FEEDING SYSTEM: The kit includes a breast pump adaptor so that moms can conveniently pump directly into the bottle, then seal for ultimate breast milk storage, warm, and feed all from one baby bottle.

MIMICS BREASTFEEDING LATCH: Nanobébé nipples mimic the natural breastfeeding latch. The innovative design features ridges that prevent the nipple from collapsing inward, so feeding time is not interrupted and baby stays latched.

NUTRIENT PRESERVING BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE: Our award-winning baby bottles for breastfed babies encourage a smooth transition from breast to bottle (and back).Baby instinctively connect to the bottle’s familiar shape, while 2x faster warming satisfies baby’s immediate hunger needs while protecting it’s vital nutrients from damaging temperatures during warming. Faster cooling protects the product.

BABY SAFE, MOM-APPROVED – A mother’s milk supports immunity and a baby’s wellbeing. We won’t spoil that with unhealthy bottles. Nanobébé’s anti-colic bottles and accessories contain absolutely no BPA, PVC, LEAD, or PHTHALATES.
body.description: Nanobebe Starter Set The Best Bottles for Breastfed Babies, Now in a Full Baby Feeding Set. This essential registry item is the perfect introduction to our range of exclusive Nanobebe products. A must-have for all breastfed babies and includes some of our most innovative essentials. Protects breastmilk nutrients during storage and warming. Easy transition - familiar shape with 2x faster warming to satisfy baby's immediate hunger needs. The Nanobebe non-electrical warming bowl, designated for quick and even warming of breastmilk. Nanobebe Flexy pacifiers, one-piece silicone construction. 2 Kinds of breast pump adaptors included. Silicone Nipples – advanced venting system designed to reduce colic. Perfect for expecting moms, and baby-shower gifts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dedicated first and foremost to babies' health, Nanobebe is proud to be a part of the special bonding moments that feeding time creates between parents and their little ones. Our sleek and modern ecosystem includes the first ever nutrient-preserving bottles, baby-loved pacifiers, eye catching travel essentials, breast milk storage, and much more. Nanobebe makes nutritional feeding and travel with little ones an absolute breeze, without sacrificing on style and convenience. Nanobebe Starter Set The Best Bottles for Breastfed Babies, Now in a Full Baby Feeding Set. This essential registry item is the perfect introduction to our range of exclusive Nanobebe products. A must-have for all breastfed babies and includes some of our most innovative essentials. Protects breastmilk nutrients during storage and warming. Easy transition - familiar shape with 2x faster warming to satisfy baby's immediate hunger needs. The Nanobebe non-electrical warming bowl, designated for quick and even warming of breastmilk. Nanobebe Flexy pacifiers, one-piece silicone construction. 2 Kinds of breast pump adaptors included. Silicone Nipples – advanced venting system designed to reduce colic. Perfect for expecting moms, and baby-shower gifts.

Pump Mothering is hard enough as it is, Nanobebe makes life easier by enabling you to pump directly into the bottle. Store Our uniquely designed bottle helps you save fridge space by stacking one bottle on top of another. More importantly, the stackable bottles allow you to track pumping order with ease. Warm The concave shape spreads the milk into a thin layer which promotes quick and even warming. This protects nutrients from damage, while providing a faster solution for when baby is crying and hungry. Feed Easy to hold and feed for the caregiver. Baby will love holding the Nanobebe bottle - Its domed shape and concave base make it ideal for tiny hands, so babies only a few months old can easily hold it and learn to self-feed.

Transition Baby instinctively connects to the bottle's familiar shape, while 2x faster warming satisfies baby's immediate hunger needs, so baby is calmer when receiving the bottle. Nutrition Quick cooling reduces bacterial growth and even warming prevents overheating. Warm breast milk at safe temperatures and feed baby promptly without destroying your precious breastmilk nutrients. Anti-colic Our Nanobebe nipples feature an advanced 360° double venting system that fights colic by reducing air pressure inside the bottle during feeding. Baby Registry Must-Haves Gift the Nanobebe experience with our special Newborn Gift Set. This exclusive gift set includes some of our most innovative products.

The New Nanobebe Gift Sets! Both award-winning Nanobebe baby bottles in one set (Breastmilk and Flexy Silicone) feature a natural mom-like feel, nutrient protection, smooth transitions between breast and bottle, and are easy to clean. For Every Feeding Journey Whether feeding baby breastmilk or formula, Nanobebe is the only line to fully equip you for both. The award-winning Breastmilk Bottle preserves nutrients, and the Flexy Bottle is the most advanced silicone baby bottle. Easily Feed without the Fuss All bottles come equipped with a slow-flow, anti-colic nipple. Our nipples feature an advanced 360° anti-colic system that relieves air pressure to prevent gas. Washing Bottles is Now a Breeze The Nanobebe Bottle Brush is the ultimate cleaning tool to get your baby’s bottles ready for the next feed. The brush features contoured sponge bristles that thoroughly clean your bottles and accessories with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST BOTTLE I’VE EVER USED ♡
reviews.reviewText: This review may be a little lengthy but I’m gonna go into all the details about how these products have changed my life.I’d like to start by saying this Newborn Bottle Starter set is the perfect gift for all the breastfeeding moms out there. It comes with 4 thick plastic bottles with breast like nipples and nipple covers and storage caps that are super easy to assemble, a ELECTRIC FREE bottle warmer that’s easy to use, a few samples of pumping bags that Nanobébé sells, 2 pacifiers (which my baby is absolutely in love with) and pump adapters for every pump on the market that allow you to pump straight in the bottle.My daughter was born 3 weeks early and we had issues latching from what we recently found out was due to a lip tie. For a while, we were having to pace feed her with a syringe and a bottle nipple and she lost a lot of weight in her first few weeks after birth. My friend gifted me with a lot of different top name brand bottles (some with anticolic and what was claimed to be “slow flow”) but every one we tried would choke her up. I decided to research different bottles and came across the Nanobébé Breastfeeding Bottles and bought the Newborn Starter Kit to give them a shot. I WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED AT ALL. These nipples actually allowed me to pace feed her without choking her up and the bottle warmer it comes with makes heating up refrigerated breastmilk a breeze. The shape of the bottles is perfect for my hands that cramp and lock up easily from tendinitis and early arthritis and carpal tunnel issues and also allows for super easy stacking storage in the cabinet as well as in the fridge. The breastmilk bags, I’ve recently discovered are also space saving as well because they lay flat and I can stack them on top rather than standing them upright like other bags that take up so much room in my fridge. I plan on purchasing more breastmilk bags and a storage organizer for my freezer. Also, the fact that every purchase of bottles I’ve got (I got the starter kit and two 3 packs of the breastmilk bottles) comes with a pump adapter so you can actually pump into the bottles, even if you only buy the bottles. And the pacifiers are the closest to the hospital grade without the bulk that I’ve been able to find. My daughter WILL NOT take any pacifier other than her Nanobébé pacifiers.If you’re thinking about purchasing these, they’re definitely worth it and I HIGHLY recommend these bottles over any other bottles on the market.Pro tip: a lot of reviews on here will say they leak but that’s only if you don’t close the bottle bottom properly. The way these bottles are built make washing them so much easier and I’ve had very little to no issues with leaking from the base. The starter kit comes with a lot of helpful little information packets that tell you how to and how not to use the products to make using them easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bottle must read review!!!
reviews.reviewText: We love this bottle!! We were looking for a bottle that would assist in allowing me some value resting time while also not giving nipple confusion to our newborn son. We bought these and they have worked out great! The only thing I would suggest and it definitely isn’t a bad thing just a important reminder is to READ THE INSTRUCTIONS: this isn’t something I thought you would need to do with a bottle but it is. My first day of milk coming in I managed to pump 4 oz of milk. It was painful, hard, and tiring. This bottle was going to be my first night of more than a hour of sleep while my husband stayed up to feed baby and bond with our son. 1am hits and Zeke is screaming he is hungry. My husband jumps up and heads to the kitchen to retrieve the bottle from fridge. While I was pumping I used the storage cap and not the nipple attachment. So my husband gets the container and proceeds to heat up some water to put it in to warm the milk. Half asleep and not reading the instructions he missed the warning on the storage cap that said do not heat up with cap on. So as he headed to the room to grab our son the bottom of the bottle popped off and all the precious milk spills out. He is trying to put the bottom back on and it just keeps popping off. At this point I’m awake and watching the horror as I try to refrain from crying because I knew it would only upset my poor husband more. I simply say help me up and I sit down in the glider to feed our son. My husband sat up the entire time he felt so bad. The next morning we get the instructions out and it clearly explains to heat up with nipple attachment. After learning this the feeding as gone great. My husband gets skin to skin bonding and feeding with our son and I get close to 4 hours solid sleep and there has been no issue with my son switching from bottle to boob! I highly recommend this product and plan on buying other products from this company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it. Works great for my preemie.
reviews.reviewText: Nanobebe review- [ ] We purchased the Nanobebe system for baby number eight. With literally every child before we used the same exact feeding system but wanted to try something new HOWEVER we were only willing to switch for the right system (good design and easy on babies stomach with no gulping air, etc). I ordered a few bottles early in pregnancy so I could get to understand them in advance and then we ordered all of the parts of the system (bottles, storage bags, carrying case, storage rack, pacifiers - EVERYTHING). The thing that stands out about the system of course is the design, it’s modern and more aligned with breastfeeding. Plus the design of the bottles makes it easy to ensure that every portion of the bottle is TRULY clean and sanitized. You just have to make sure that you push firmly and close the base tightly. The milk warmer works quickly and all I do is add hot water and throw in either the bottle or the bag of stored milk. I really appreciate the adapters that make it easy to connect with my Medela breast pump. And the storage bags are durable which is great for freezing breast milk and ensuring it’s quality when thawed. The part that has me committed to the system permanently is that my little one loves it. She was born prematurely and has struggles with feeding. The nipples work great for her and the Nanobebe pacifiers are the only ones that she will accept comfortably. I also love that there is a carrying case made specifically for the bottles considering their unique shape. Having that ability to keep milk chilled in the case while you’re out is an extra bonus. I’m looking forward to purchasing the newer flex bottles once our little one has grow more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thank the lord
reviews.reviewText: Im getting back surgery soon and I have been so stressed about getting my 2 month old son to take a bottle. I bought about 5 different brands and he hated all of them. When I got these in the mail i immediately washed them and went to feed my son. He took it immediately! Having these bottles has taken a lot of anxiety off of my shoulders. Now I’m not so worried about how he’s going to feed while I’m in surgery and through recovery. Really happy I bought these bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby has always been breastfed and these are the only bottles that I can get my baby to take milk from. Some reviews said that the bottom of the bottle leaks but I’ve never had that problem.
Llega como lo indican en las especifocaciones del producto, es un buen producto y muy recomendable para tu bebe...

No lo imaginé al comprarlos pero la forma del biberón hace muy incómodo darle el biberón al bebé; la única forma de que no trague aire bebe es que esté totalmente acostado sobre una superficie plana, no se puede dar mientras se carga al bebé. Además el color del plástico no permite apreciar bien cuánta agua se está colocando para prepara la fórmula. Muy decepcionada del producto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have tried every bottle on the market with my previous children and this one has got to be the best. As a breastfeeding mother I was worried about nipple confusion but this was not the case so my partner can have a turn feeding the baby. My baby took to the dummy and bottles straight away the teats and dummy definitely have a breast like feeling to them so was easy for my baby to get used to them immediately. Comes with everything stated in the picture and instructions are easy to follow. Will definitely be sticking to nanobebe for the future thank you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When breastfeeding exclusively it was hard to find a bottle that worked but finally found a bottle that works for my baby.
